description: The contracting entity, Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada, is seeking one (1) Agricultural Tractor.
full_summary:
===============

### Agricultural Tractor Tender Announcement

#### Reference Number: cb-119-46619492

#### Solicitation Number: 01R11-25-C004

#### Tender Closing Date: February 12, 2024, 12:00 PM (noon)

This tender notification is for the procurement of one (1) Agricultural Tractor by Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada.

**Description of Requirements**
------------------------------

The contracting authority requires one (1) Agricultural Tractor. The tender process is open only to suppliers holding a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request for Market Arrangement (RFSA) E60HS-18AGTR/A. Suppliers wishing to become pre-qualified under this RFSA should refer to the Buy and Sell website for more information.

**Delivery Date**
------------------

The estimated delivery date for the Agricultural Tractor is June 30, 2024.

**Debriefings**
--------------

Bidders who are not successful in their bid will be notified and may request a debriefing within 15 working days from receipt of the notification. Debriefings may be provided in writing, by telephone, or in person.

**Contact Information**
----------------------

The contact person for this tender is Zach Flamont, Procurement Officer. He can be reached at (639) 560-3462 or by email at zack.flamont@agr.gc.ca.

**Tender Requirements**
----------------------

This tender is subject to the Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA), and other trade agreements specified below.

Trade Agreements:

* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
* World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
